title: Request Medical Records
description: In a personal injury case, a paralegal needs to request the plaintiff's medical records from a hospital.

tasks.description: Obtain a signed HIPAA authorization from the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms a valid authorization is on file.

tasks.description: Draft a letter to the hospital's medical records department requesting all records related to the client's treatment for their injuries.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a clear and specific request letter.

tasks.description: Send the request letter along with the signed HIPAA authorization to the hospital.
